attributes.action: Enforce muzzles for ALL dogs when off the lead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people are injured and killed each year by dogs that unexpectedly attack humans. The suffering caused is unacceptable. If all dogs were forced to be muzzled when not on the lead then many of these deaths and injuries would be avoided.
In 2004-2005, there was a total of 4,540 dog attacks in the UK. Why not prevent more?
